name: thedailybeast
text:
What D.C. Mayor Muriel Bowser does know is that she was attacked by the president on Twitter and he lost: “Not to sound like I’m in the kindergarten, but he started it.” 

Listen to the latest episode of #TheNewAbnormalPod. https://t.co/qtLoyaoCzN

name: thedailybeast
text: The CEO of CrossFit has resigned after making racist remarks about the new coronavirus and George Floyd that sparked backlash from affiliated gym owners, members, and sponsors https://t.co/91S2aOPy1o

name: thedailybeast
text: In a statement to The Daily Beast, Katzeff apologized but noted that he was working at a comedic publication at the time: “History has shown that they are not funny and I regret posting them. I’m sorry for the offense and pain they may have caused.”  https://t.co/K5V1xbIUf6

name: thedailybeast
text: EXCLUSIVE: Top officials on President Trump’s coronavirus task force told governors they were worried about a spike in infections due to the mass protests against racial injustice taking place across the country https://t.co/wGTslDRPwk
